channel.title: Experiment on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Experiment on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: anti-castro
item.description: Today, as I was walking to work. I glanced over and noticed that castro was standing impatiently next to me. He qwas jonesin to cross the street. He was wearing a workers uniform. Always the joker I guess :). As he skipped across the street.. I couldn’t help but think of the bay of pigs.. if only kennedy could see him now.. or kruschev for that matter.Soon I get my DSS stuff.
